text:
When converting SVG file into PDF file, a defined pattern in the SVG file 
wasn't transformed corretly in the corresponding PDF file.
In the submitted sample SVG file, the outline pattern surrounding the axes was 
lost in the converted PDF file, why?
We use the xml-fop_20040318232912.tar.gz for this testing
creator: gliu@actuate.com
